title: Glee Ice Hair Thickener Spray - Upgrade Fluffy Volumizing Hair Spray Products - Natural Plant Protein Hair Spray - Magic Styling Gel for All Hair Types - Non Greasy & Non Sticky (30ml-1PC)
features: 【Hair Volumizer and Texture Mist】· Spray easily and provide a layered, textured finish and provide lightweight hold that looks great and lasts all day.
【Unique Non-Stick Formula】· Our ultra-lightweight formula doesn't leave a sticky residue or buildup like mousse or sea salt spray, which means it doesn't weigh down locks like other products!

【Simple Molding】· Perfect for use as a pre styler as it gives a light hold, natural definition, and effortless finish, this volumizing spray + hair thickener is versatile enough to suit all hair types and lengths!

【Save Time】· The magic spray is designed to focus on lifting the hair and getting it higher. Just spray on dry hair and styling in your wishing looks! Now you can rock your hairstyle without heating or going to the salon!

【Suitable for All Hair Types】· Perfect as a pre-styler as it provides light hold, natural definition and effortless results, is the professional stylist's secret weapon for achieving great looking, easy to manage styles. Suitable for all hair types and lengths.
